sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const facilities = [ { id: 1, name: "Downtown Health Clinic", address: "123 Main St", about: "A primary care clinic offering general health checkups, outpatient services, and more.", image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/64f86958cbb3ab0d42bdcfc7e147c123b5342f5eae207c89f0bbb848ea0d1c67?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=8f0d2cc9bf764b679624a1d309a49f82", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["General Physician", "Cardiologist"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Pediatrician", "Dermatologist"] }, ] }, { id: 2, name: "Northside Wellness Center", address: "456 Elm St", about: "A wellness center specializing in cardiology, dermatology, and outpatient surgery.", image: "https://example.com/facility2.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Cardiologist"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Dermatologist", "Gynecologist"] }, ] }, { id: 3, name: "West End Pediatrics", address: "789 Oak St", about: "Providing pediatric care and child health services to the community.", image: "https://example.com/facility3.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Pediatrician"] }, ] }, { id: 4, name: "Eastside Medical Complex", address: "321 Birch Rd", about: "A multi-specialty medical complex with outpatient treatment and surgery facilities.", image: "https://example.com/facility4.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Orthopedic Surgeon"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Neurologist"] }, { id: 3, specializations: ["General Physician"] }, ] }, { id: 5, name: "Central City Hospital", address: "654 Pine St", about: "A hospital offering both emergency and outpatient services, with specialized surgical teams.", image: "https://example.com/facility5.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Surgeon", "Anesthesiologist"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Cardiologist", "Pulmonologist"] }, ] }, { id: 6, name: "Green Valley Clinic", address: "987 Maple Ave", about: "A general healthcare clinic offering a wide range of services including dental care.", image: "https://example.com/facility6.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Dentist"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Dermatologist"] }, ] }, { id: 7, name: "Riverfront Health Center", address: "123 River St", about: "A healthcare facility specializing in neurological and mental health treatments.", image: "https://example.com/facility7.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Neurologist", "Psychiatrist"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Psychologist"] }, ] }, { id: 8, name: "Lakeside Orthopedics", address: "789 Lake Dr", about: "An orthopedic care facility focusing on sports injuries, joint replacement, and physiotherapy.", image: "https://example.com/facility8.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Orthopedic Surgeon", "Physiotherapist"] }, ] }, { id: 9, name: "Hilltop Maternity Clinic", address: "456 Hilltop Rd", about: "A maternity clinic providing prenatal care, gynecology, and pediatric services.", image: "https://example.com/facility9.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Gynecologist"] }, { id: 2, specializations: ["Pediatrician"] }, ] }, { id: 10, name: "Sunset Dental Clinic", address: "123 Sunset Blvd", about: "A modern dental clinic offering general dentistry, orthodontics, and cosmetic treatments.", image: "https://example.com/facility10.jpg", rooms: [ { id: 1, specializations: ["Dentist", "Orthodontist"] }, ] } ]; function FacilityGrid({ onEdit }) { return (

All Facilities

    {facilities.map((facility) => (
  • {facility.name}
    • ))}
); } export default FacilityGrid;
